text:
This is great, @Collin_McCune.

Too many in power have failed to see innovation as a positive, but have focused on predation and harm perpetrated by the worst offenders. 

And while they may truly be attempting to limit bad behavior, end up creating regulation that only prevents better solutions from arising organically, entrenching the tired and sub-optimal choices we already have.

Your essay here offers a good framework that policymakers would be wise to heed. I particularly like the suggestion to "Default to permissionless innovation until thereâ€™s a clear reason not to."
